input.description: XML document conforming to the ConnectionDetails Concept that contains the information required to execute a command. <BladeLogicConnectionDetail> <adapter-name>BladeLogic Adapter</adapter-name> </BladeLogicConnectionDetail>

DBKey of the provision job. If you are using PXE, status can be: - Pre-discovered - Discovered - Bios Info - Queued - Check State - Disk Cleanup - Hardware Config - Disk Array Config - Pre Disk Partition - Disk Partition - Post Disk Partition - Format - Make Run Once - Phase 1 OS Install - Phase 2 OS Install - Provisioned
If you are using JumpStart, status can be: - Make Jumpstart files - Added Rule Entry - Check Rules Succeeded - Add Install Client - Reboot Script Finished - OS Install Finished
If you are using NIM, status can be: - Make NIM files - Defined NIM Resources - Pre-MachineDef script finished - Defined NIM Machine - Pre-Bosinst script finished - Bosinst Initiated - Post-Bosinst script finished - Bosinst finished - OS Install Finished

output.description: Success status of the command. "true" if successful, "false" otherwise.
If "success" is false then error message contains the corresponding error message if any.
Contains the textual description of the job status of the identified provisioning job.
Contains any debug message accompanying the adapter response.
Contains the output part of the adapter response.

documentation.description:
This command returns a textual description of the job status of the identified provisioning job.
If you are using PXE, status can be:
* Pre-discovered * Discovered * Bios Info * Queued * Check State * Disk Cleanup * Hardware Config * Disk Array Config * Pre Disk Partition * Disk Partition * Post Disk Partition * Format * Make Run Once * Phase 1 OS Install * Phase 2 OS Install * Provisioned
If you are using JumpStart, status can be:
* Make Jumpstart files * Added Rule Entry * Check Rules Succeeded * Add Install Client * Reboot Script Finished * OS Install Finished
If you are using NIM, status can be:
* Make NIM files * Defined NIM Resources * Pre-MachineDef script finished * Defined NIM Machine * Pre-Bosinst script finished * Bosinst Initiated * Post-Bosinst script finished * Bosinst finished * OS Install Finished
